# castai_cache_group (Resource)

Manage CAST AI DBO Cache Group. Cache groups enable query caching for database workloads.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example: Basic cache group for MySQL database
resource "castai_cache_group" "mysql_cache" {
  protocol_type = "MySQL"
  name          = "my-mysql-cache"
  direct_mode   = false
}

# Example: PostgreSQL cache group with direct mode
resource "castai_cache_group" "postgres_cache" {
  protocol_type = "PostgreSQL"
  name          = "my-postgres-cache"
  direct_mode   = true
}

# Example: Cache group with custom endpoints
resource "castai_cache_group" "custom_endpoints" {
  protocol_type = "MySQL"
  name          = "cache-with-endpoints"

  endpoints {
    hostname = "db.example.com"
    port     = 3306
    name     = "primary"
  }

  endpoints {
    hostname = "db-replica.example.com"
    port     = 3306
    name     = "replica"
  }
}

# Output the cache group endpoints
output "mysql_cache_endpoints" {
  value       = castai_cache_group.mysql_cache.endpoints
  description = "Cache group connection endpoints"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Display name for the cache group.
- `protocol_type` (String) Database protocol type. Valid values: MySQL or PostgreSQL

### Optional

- `direct_mode` (Boolean) Enable direct mode for the cache group.
- `endpoints` (Block List) Connection endpoints for the cache group. At least one endpoint is required when specified. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--endpoints))
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--endpoints"></a>
### Nested Schema for `endpoints`

Required:

- `hostname` (String) Database instance hostname.
- `name` (String) Name for the endpoint.
- `port` (Number) Database instance port.


<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
- `read` (String)
- `update` (String)
